summary: My attempt to mix warrior classes with buff, active effect, and aoe style magic.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://s13.postimg.org/h40tp7vk7/01_Introduction_PTS.png[/img]

I am about to get this going again. Once I finish downloading all the mods I plan on using for a foundation. Installing them, working out the bugs, and archiving the folder.
Gonna be a bit :P

I do plan to get back on track with this, because I think there is a good number of people who would like to see this idea get tuned.
If any of you are good with scripts and want to lend a hand, I can add you to a team.
For now I am going to work on it alone and only fine tune everything currently on the mod.[/center]
[center]_ __ ___ __________ ___ __ _[/center]
[size=22][font=impact][b][u]Welcome to Power Tomes for Skyrim[/u][/b][/font][/size]
Power Tomes for Skyrim (PTS) adds many new spells to the game. Over 85+ spells in the form of Lesser Powers.
The goal is to create balanced spells that allows players to play mixed warrior classes.

The idea of not having to switch between weapon and spell seemed way more obvious when I finally thought about it. So I decided to convert many self target and aoe magic spells that allow warrior classes to cast such spells without the need to disarm their weapon.

I do not modify vanilla spells or items.

MUST USE MOD:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23416/?Â  - More Hotkeys Please!

You will be able to bind items, spells, powers, shouts, even full item sets to a key or key combo.
Makes playing Skyrim worthwhile again.

[center][img]http://s22.postimg.org/iekq9ijb5/02_Summary_PTS.png[/img][/center]
[center]_ __ ___ __________ ___ __ _[/center]
[font=impact][b][u][size=22]Progress[/size][/u][/b][/font]
Thus far, I have converted many vanilla Skyrim and [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16225]Apocalypse Spell Package[/url][/b] v4.0 spells into Lesser Powers while leaving the original spells intact.
I will add more original spells later on. I'd rather not have a bunch of buggy and unbalanced spells without being addressed before adding new ones like in versions previous to 2.1.
Primarily, only self-cast spells have been converted. Shooting fireballs out of nowhere would look silly.

[size=5](OUTDATED: I have to check out ASP since it has been updated recently. I suggest you only use the vanilla plugin.)[/size]

[font=impact][b][u][size=22]Where to get the Powers[/size][/u][/b][/font]
Power Tomes can be found being sold by Mages in the College of Winterhold. Seeing as how it is the only real place to study magic, it seemed fitting to begin distribution there.
Not all Power Tomes are being sold by one person. Each Mage sells Power Tomes according to the school of magic they specialize in.

NOTE: Farengar in Whiterun sells all the Standalone Power Tomes. I have to figure out how to distribute them better. Will do so next version.

It is highly recommended that you use [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23416]More HotKeys Please![/url][/b].


[center][img]http://s15.postimg.org/9lwc0sojf/03_Modules_PTS.png[/img][/center]
[center]_ __ ___ __________ ___ __ _[/center]
[font=impact][b][u][size=22]Modules[/size][/u][/b][/font]
All the plugins are modular. Meaning no plugin is reliant on each other. However, you will be required to download the mod the plugin is based on.
The requirements are based off what I used to create the latest plugin version. The requirements MAY be lower, but meet the minimum to be on the safe side.

[font=verdana][b][u]Power Tomes - 00 Standalone.esp[/u][/b][/font]
- [b]REQUIRES[/b]: [b]The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim v1.9.29[/b] or newer

[font=verdana][b][u]Power Tomes - 01 Apocalypse.esp[/u][/b][/font]
- [b]REQUIRES[/b]: [b]The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim v1.9.29[/b] or newer
- [b]REQUIRES[/b]: [b][url=skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url][/b] v1.6.11 or newer.
- [b]REQUIRES[/b]: [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16225]Apocalypse Spell Package[/url][/b] v4.0 or newer.


[center][img]http://s11.postimg.org/iikphso37/04_Installation_PTS.png[/img][/center]
[center]_ __ ___ __________ ___ __ _[/center]

[font=impact][b][u][size=22]Manual Install[/size][/u][/b][/font]
[b][u]IMPORTANT: Delete all files associated with previous version of this mod! Read change log for details![/u][/b]
Click "Download Manually" in the Files section.
Drag and drop the plugins you want to use into the Skyrim/Data directory.
Run Skyrim Launcher, click "Data Files", activate in the load list.
Done!

[font=impact][b][u][size=22]Using NMM[/size][/u][/b][/font]
[b][u]IMPORTANT: Delete all files associated with previous version of this mod! Read change log for details![/u][/b]
Click "Install with Manager" in the Files section.
Wait for download to finish. Once finished, find the mod, double-click to activate it.
Choose the plugins you wish to use.
Done!

[b][u]IMPORTANT: Make sure to delete any plugin you won't be using.[/u][/b]

[b][url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php/How_to_install_Skyrim_mods]Here is a more detailed Newbie Guide[/url][/b]

[center][img]http://s12.postimg.org/3x4t1cj0t/05_Compatibility_PTS.png[/img][/center]
[center]_ __ ___ __________ ___ __ _[/center]
[font=impact][b][u][size=22]Compatibility Info[/size][/u][/b][/font]
I run this mod along side many other popular mods including:
- [b][u]Skyrim Redone[/u][/b]
- [b][u]Apocalypse Spell Package[/u][/b]
- [b][u]Better Vampires[/u][/b]
- [b][u]MoreHotKeysPlease[/u][/b]
- [b][u]And over +150 other plugins[/u][/b]
There seems to be no issues since I do not touch any of the contents of the master files.
All the spells, books, effects, ect. are new records or untouched master file content.

Please report any issues that surface. Thanks! :D

[center][img]http://s22.postimg.org/c261j1x6p/06_Future_Plans_PTS.png[/img][/center]
[center]_ __ ___ __________ ___ __ _[/center]
[font=impact][b][u][size=22]More Spells[/size][/u][/b][/font]
I plan to add more original spells to the standalone version and also make new plugins based off other spell packages, with author permission of course.

[font=impact][b][u][size=22]No Bugs and Balance[/size][/u][/b][/font]
I want to get to the point where there are no bugs and the spells are balanced and useful. This will take good community support and a good eye. So if you feel something is too strong, or too weak, let me know and I will take a look, but will actively balance it myself.




[center][img]http://s15.postimg.org/x70dys94r/07_Spells_List_PTS.png[/img][/center]
[center]_ __ ___ __________ ___ __ _[/center]
To be added! Will take plenty of time to categorize, list, and add descriptions so be a little patient :)



[center][img]http://s24.postimg.org/w5ib9466t/08_Change_Log_PTS.png[/img][/center]
[center]_ __ ___ __________ ___ __ _[/center]

As some of you may notice, I am setting back the mod version back to 1.0.
This mod was called "Supertrons Power Tomes".
Along with a name change, brand spankin' new page and a big rework of the plugins, I have decided to start with a clean slate.
I did not take records of all the changes I made but will do so from now on.
Just want a fresh start :). I will only do this ONCE. So don't worry.

Q: [b][u]Can he do that?[/u][/b]
A:[b][u] I just did! :D[/u][/b]
Latest version of the original was 2.0.

[font=impact][b][u][size=22]Release Info[/size][/u][/b][/font]
[b][u]Version 1.0[/u][/b]
- [color=white][b]Re-release with big rework. Detailed logs from now on.[/b][/color]
author: Supertron
